locations.name: Church
locations.description:
You are teleported to a church filled with wooden pews and an altar.
There is a wooden door to the south.

locations.name: Courtyard
locations.description:
Open area surrounded by stone walls.
North is a door that leads to the church.
South there is a door to the watchtower.
West are grand doors leading to the great hall.

locations.name: Watchtower
locations.description:
A small room containing a table and chair, with a sleeping guard slumped over the table.
North is a door that leads to the courtyard.
Narrow stairs lead up to the armory and down to the dungeon.

locations.name: Armory
locations.description:
A small room containing many weapons: SWORDS, MACES, and HALBERDS.
There is also a spare TUNIC that the guards wear.
It has the INSIGNIA of the king.

locations.name: Dungeon
locations.description:
Gloomy, cold and dripping water.
Shackles dangle from the walls.
In one of the cells huddles a bloodied PRISONER.
You notice a piece of paper reading 'password'

locations.name: Great Hall
locations.description:
You notice the ceiling is 20 feet high.
Light from elegant windows fills the room.
North is a door leading to the wizard's tower.
It appears a diamond shaped key is needed to enter the tower.

locations.name: Kitchen
locations.description:
You see servants scrubbing pots, dishes, and the floor.
An large hearth illuminates the room.
On a table there is a KNIFE and a bottle
 labeled Rat POISON.

locations.name: Royal Lounge
locations.description:
The Royal Lounge has a few couches, a table surrounded with chairs.
This room is usually used for important meetings with the king.
In this room you will find a key that open the door to the Wizard's Tower.

locations.name: Royal Library
locations.description:
Filled with shelves of books, cushioned chairs and a table at the rooms center.
At the table sits a tall gangly figure with a long white beard.

locations.name: King's Chambers
locations.description: The King's Chambers is off limits.

locations.name: Wizard's Foyer
locations.description:
Large dimly lit room.
You hear strange snorts and snarls.
You see a 10-foot, dragon-scaled, lion-headed chimera
 with bat wings spanning 30 feet,
claws as sharp as spikes, and a tail with the head of a serpent with venom dripping fangs.
Luckily, it is asleep.

locations.name: Wizard's Chambers
locations.description:
You see a bed covered by a dark quilt, table, and chair.
Sitting in the chair, looking at you, is the WIZARD.

locations.name: Laboratory
locations.description:
Beakers and vials filled with colorful, bubbling and smoking liquids fill the room.
You see a jug of MEAD and MEAT on a table. Perhaps this is the wizards dinner, I could possible poison it...

locations.name: Queen's Garden
locations.description:
The Queen's Garden is full of luscious greenery, with thousands of wild flowers. 
You received a summons from your Queen to meet her here.
You should talk to her.
